definition: lit. to spin silk from cocoons/fig. to make a painstaking investigation (idiom)
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: In investigating a process, yang Jiaming gradually reel off raw silk from cocoons pares chrysalis, find really fierce.
sentences.chinese: 在調查過程中，楊家明逐漸抽絲剝繭，找到真兇。

definition: the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
lit. spider's thread and horse track/tiny hints (of a secret)/traces/clue
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
